Description:
=========
This is a resource, That Adds the Vampire Book into the World of Skyim.
You can find the Vampire Book in Riften on Top of a Barrel next to the Giant Well.

Permission
==========
Usable in other mods without explicit permission.

---------------

Ver 1.1
